The Ultimate Civil Solution.

Clio: Legal Practice Management Solution.

Government attorneys unite. Let go of outdated technology and modernize your legal department with improved workflow, centralized functionality, and a flexible platform for future modifications.

Schedule a free demo.

The Clio Solution.

Matter/Case Management

Get rid of filing cabinets, clutter, and missing files when you store case and matter files in a centralized, online environment. Stop hunting for information by attaching notes, documents, tasks, calendars, and contacts directly to a matter.

Task Management

Shape the department’s focus by assigning the priority for each task. Dashboard capabilities let staff and managers see at a glance what everyone is working on, and the status of their efforts.

Automated Workflow

Instantly streamline your workflow, improve efficiency, and help ensure accountability and accuracy across your entire organizational structure. Create one-step actions for universal tasks so you can spend more time on the important aspects of law.

Document Management

Securely store and easily access all your department’s documentation. Clio provides unlimited amounts of document storage in an organized, protected and portable digital filing cabinet.

Reporting & Compliance

Meeting compliance and reporting requirements can be a tedious and cumbersome activity. Easily generate accurate and up-to-date reports. Customizable fields and practice areas make it easy to find important cases through filters.

Mobile Access & Security

Enjoy peace of mind, while meeting ethical and regulatory requirements, whether you’re in the office, or on-the-go. Safely access, update, and share documents anywhere with Clio’s bank-level security with SSL encryption and daily audits.

A Modern Approach for Government Legal Departments

Much has changed over the last decade with the introduction of software as a service (SaaS) technologies and the delivery flexibility they offer. Download this whitepaper to find out the impact of letting go of outdated technology and modernizing a legal department with improved workflow, centralized functionality, and a flexible platform for future modifications.
